response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its actual value and the amount you perceive it to be worth, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction and a fair transaction. We look forward to discussing this proposal further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 950000}
